about_the_game: You have the briefcase, and now something relentless is hunting you. Blending into the crowd, it hides in plain sight, waiting to strike. In this short demo, get a taste of the full experience as you navigate tense environments like subways and crowded streets, using strategy to keep your distance. Experience the core mechanics—dashing through claustrophobic crowds, managing your stamina with a shaky inhaler, and keeping a constant eye on the ever-shifting threat. Trust no one—it could be anyone. Can you survive the chase?

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content in "Crowded Followed" primarily revolves around its themes of horror and suspense. The game contains explicit violence and graphic imagery, it also creates an intense and frightening atmosphere that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players will encounter themes of fear, survival, and the supernatural, as well as potentially unsettling claustrophobic situations as they navigate through the game's environments. Additionally, the pursuit by the shape-shifting entity may create moments of tension and dread. CROWDED.FOLLOWED. is intended for a mature audience comfortable with experiencing immersive horror content.
